email or pm for descriptions most are vg
[url]sflayank@aol.com[/url]

$2000 for all
havent broken it down by price yet
but for all you so called collectors out there
please do not offer me $5 or $10 or $15 a card
i dont care if you waste your time but dont waste my time
the nrmt book price on the lot is around $16000 so thats about 12.5%
so dont offer me 500 for the lot
i have guys on post war offering $5000 for a psa 5 mantle 52 topps...theyre morons...im hoping the pre war section might be a little smarter
but so far thats not the case
so try not to be stupid, dont insult me with stupid offers because all youre doing is insulting yourself
thank you
larry
Thanks for the pics but I am going to pass on the lot-  thanks James

Brian

Perhaps the prima donna should change his user name to hollywood? 201's are a hot commodity though so he should find a buyer in no time :rolleyes: 

I actually do think the set is underappreciated though. If the op only had the key cards instead of junk I would consider making an "reasonable" offer. But no Cobb/Crawford, no interest!
